title: maravEn orupOdum
sahitya:
maravEn orupOdum tillai manruL ADiya mANikkamE unnai


anupallavi

  arivAi ennuLLE niraivAi aruTjyOti virivAi viLangiDum iraivA iraivA unnai


caraNam    kadir mati pUTTiya kAla tarham ennaik-kaN kaTTi emmAyak-kATTinil viTTAlum
vidhiyaiyum venriDum mati tarum appanE vittaganE unadu bhakti paravashattai
